sentence.text: In order to address these questions, we searched for alterations in G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway, adenylate cyclase-inhibiting G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway, and EDN1 in patients with typical Auriculocondylar syndrome (n = 3), Pierre Robin sequence-plus (n = 3), micrognathia with additional craniofacial malformations (n = 4), or non-specific auricular dysplasia (n = 1), which could represent subtypes of Auriculocondylar syndrome.

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-inhibiting G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Auriculocondylar syndrome, mainly characterized by micrognathia, small mandibular condyle, and question mark prolyl-tRNA aminoacylation, is a rare disease segregating in an autosomal dominant pattern in the majority of the families reported in the literature.
